block.name: invoke_custom_ruby_code
block.description: Execute ruby code: Get Latest Package Details

input.code:
# @param input [Hash] input hash supplied in the recipe step
# @return value returned in the last line
# Eg: Code for returning country code for an IP address
# {
#   country_code: get("http://freegeoip.net/json/" + input["ip_address"])
# }
latest_package_id = ""
deployment_details = input['deployment_details']
latest_deployment = deployment_details.sort_by {|x| (x[:deployed_on].to_time)}.last
if latest_deployment.present?
  latest_package_id = latest_deployment[:package_id]
  latest_package_version = latest_deployment[:package_version]
  deployment_comments = latest_deployment[:deployment_comments]
  execution_reference = latest_deployment[:execution_reference]
end
{
	latest_package_id: latest_package_id,
  	latest_package_version: latest_package_version,
	deployment_comments: deployment_comments,
    execution_reference: execution_reference
}
input.name: Get Latest Package Details

input.stop_reason: No latest package found for project '#{_('data.lookup_table.fc5636b1.entries.first.entry.col2')}' to promote.
